station_storage module

class station_storage.StationStorage(env: Environment, capacity: int, policy: ChargingPolicy)

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for a station storage.

Attributes: - capacity (int): the maximum number of vehicles that can be stored in the station. - policy (ChargingPolicy): the charging policy used by the station. - slots (simpy.Store): a store that represents the slots available for vehicles in the station. - available_vehicles (simpy.Store): a store that represents the vehicles available for charging in the station.

abstract add_vehicle(vehicle: Vehicle)

Adds a vehicle to the station.

Parameters: - vehicle (Vehicle): the vehicle to add to the station.

abstract charged(vehicle: Vehicle)

Called when a vehicle has finished charging.

Parameters: - vehicle (Vehicle): the vehicle that has finished charging.

lock(vehicle)

Locks a vehicle in the station.

Parameters: - vehicle (Vehicle): the vehicle to lock in the station.

abstract need_reschedule()

Returns whether the station needs to reschedule the charging of its vehicles.

Returns: - bool: True if the station needs to reschedule the charging of its vehicles, False otherwise.

abstract next_vehicle_to_charge(charging_vehicles: list)

Returns the next vehicle to charge.

Parameters: - charging_vehicles (list): a list of vehicles that are currently charging.

Returns: - Vehicle: the next vehicle to charge.

abstract pop_vehicle() → Vehicle

Removes and returns the next vehicle to charge.

Returns: - Vehicle: the next vehicle to charge.

unlock(user)

Unlocks a vehicle from the station.

Parameters: - user (User): the user that unlocks the vehicle.

class station_storage.StationStorageLIFO(env: Environment, capacity: int, policy: ChargingPolicy)

Bases: StationStorage

A station storage that uses a last-in, first-out (LIFO) policy for charging its vehicles.

add_vehicle(vehicle: Vehicle)

Adds a vehicle to the station.

Parameters: - vehicle (Vehicle): the vehicle to add to the station.

Called when a vehicle has finished charging.

Parameters: - vehicle (Vehicle): the vehicle that has finished charging.

need_reschedule()

Returns whether the station needs to reschedule the charging of its vehicles.

Returns: - bool: True if the station needs to reschedule the charging of its vehicles, False otherwise.

next_vehicle_to_charge(charging_vehicles: list)

Returns the next vehicle to charge.

Parameters: - charging_vehicles (list): a list of vehicles that are currently charging.

Returns: - Vehicle: the next vehicle to charge.

pop_vehicle() → Vehicle

Returns: - Vehicle: the next vehicle to charge.
